website_summaries.verdict: The 360fly 4K is just all-around a better camera than the original, and its excellent mobile app is a definite plus compared to competing cameras. You'll just have to be forgiving of its image quality.
pros: The 360fly 4K is a water-resistant and dust- and shockproof 360-degree camera
It has a standard tripod mount, 64GB of internal storage, a single button for power and recording
The mobile app makes it very simple to capture, edit and share your 360-degree movies to YouTube and Facebook
cons: Video quality is best suited for small screens where artifacts and purple fringing are less noticeable
It's a little pokey to power up
Built-in memory and battery, and no Micro-USB on the camera mean you always need its cradle for charging or transfers

customer_reviews.title: Warning. Do not buy this in 2019
customer_reviews.text: This camera hardware and packaging wise, looks cool. As soon as you download the software for the phones or desktop tho, everything goes south. The login system is broken in app and on their website. The Facebook connection required to live stream is broken (apparently from their forums it’s been broken for 5 months). Streaming is impossible. The other company who had an app for live-streaming with this camera have gone out of business and their app is no longer on the stores. Their website still looks slick, but look at all the complaints on their forums. Total lack of support and no response. Looks like the company will go out of business soon.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: No way to view this camera live
customer_reviews.text: This would probably be one of my favorite cameras to use if it had software for my phone. My daughter is in a wheelchair and when we drive long distance, she cannot see outside the car. I bought this camera so we can go places and let her see things that she couldn't get to. We have GoPros, but I thought that this form factor would be awesome, and it is a great design. BUT THERE IS NO SOFTWARE TO VIEW IT LIVE. There used to be software, but when they went belly up, they killed their software. Now, it is just a paperweight in a paper free environment.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I will never buy this product again
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost I am shocked that Amazon would sale such a defective product and also upon doing my own research which I sadly should have done before buying this product I think the company went belly-up because their app on the phone alone is terrible and defective I would not recommend this product for no one not even the 4K version if you're going to buy a 360 view go with a Kodak or some other product I really had high hopes for this product but personally sing it myself tells me that it's not worth the money or time on Amazon needs to stop selling this product immediately
customer_reviews.author: Israel Grant

customer_reviews.title: Product support is non-existant
customer_reviews.text: When i received the camera I did not realize it would take so long to set up. It came in a flimsy box, with no instructions. Picture quality is ok , the software is garbage and the only real way you can optimize usage. You cannot flip the camera upside down only on post production. Live streaming does not work eve tho it literally says go live on the view screen. It shows it can connect to Facebook and twitter which are also false. the software was never fully developed. They claim to have went with another app called "Livit" which also went out of business. save your money for a better 360 camera
customer_reviews.author: Alex c.

customer_reviews.title: The housing it not easy to seal up but can be done
customer_reviews.text: 360FLY is NOT WATER PROOF AT ALL DON'T BE FOOLED! The first camera flooded in less then 5 feet of water. 360Fly sent me a second one and it flooded too. Then they told me it needed a housing and 360Fly sent a housing to me Free of charge and a Third 360Fly camera. They obviously knew there was a problem or they would not have sent me another camera FREE of charge. The housing it not easy to seal up but can be done. The button on housing does NOT push the button camera in far enough to turn it on once it is in the housing.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Sanger

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY - not worth the "360" feature (that isn't really 360*)
customer_reviews.text: One of the worst purchases I've ever made. The camera is super buggy and scratches easily - and the repair is crazy expensive!!!
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Battery is a huge fail
customer_reviews.text: The battery doesn't hold a charge and even when it's freshly charged, it tapped out after about 20 min. Then it takes 4 hours to recharge for another 20 minutes of use. Just sitting there turned off, it still doesn't hold a charge, so when I needed it, the on button didn't even work because it was totally depleted. Video quality appears low res (mostly due to the 1080 divided by a massive fish eye angle) and sound is "meh."
customer_reviews.author: Know-it-all

customer_reviews.title: You can't live stream via Facebook.
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm not impressed with the UI if any video is more than 4 min it will not download to a device. The live streaming using Facebook does not work at all. The white balance set to Auto is very bad in daylight conditions. And if it is even a slight bit dark outside you can't see anything. I will give it a fair chance and maybe I need to learn more about the camera before I decide if I need to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Bellafamilia

customer_reviews.title: Fish eye lens distortion; Video quality questionable.
customer_reviews.text: The image/video quality is not that greater in low light and compared with demo footage not even close, at least the camera I have tested. Fish eye lens does distort image too much. I did return the camera, disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: It seems relatively easy to capture the footage
customer_reviews.text: It seems relatively easy to capture the footage, it can be controlled by my iPhone, and the quality seems to be great, but the software is a steep learning curve. I haven't figured it all out yet, and it is not viewable on an iPhone photo roll due to the 360 nature of the footage. So I have all this footage and have no idea how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy M

customer_reviews.title: Junk camera & not water resistant at all
customer_reviews.text: This camera accidentally fell into a foot of water and stopped working. Seller will not give a replacement since it was bough on sale. The box came worn and faded as if were sitting outside in the sun for months. I highly recommend you look at different options. Shame on the seller and Amazon for not exchanging my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: User710

customer_reviews.title: 360 Degrees of Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little camera. Shoots beautiful video and pictures. Don't mount it to an RC with gaff tape though.... you're going to have a bad time if you do that.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Jack

customer_reviews.title: Flood tested, Hurricane Strong!
customer_reviews.text: I've had my 360 Fly for almost a year now, It's been thru the Louisiana floods, Hurricane Matthew and SUP! Never had a problem with it. If your looking for a full 360, it's only 270, so you have to know your purpose before shooting. While I'd love a full 360, I'm good with what the Fly delivers and I'm sure the 360 Crew will deliver the whole package as time moves on.....
customer_reviews.author: Kaye C.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: software is so so bad its not worth using this item
customer_reviews.author: Ask-Away

customer_reviews.title: i don't recommend it
customer_reviews.text: 1- you need an application to work with it, and no direct download from the camera 2- you are limited to 5 min or 2 gb per video 3- takes so long to download the video my exp. (takes forever to download 10 sec video) I attached a photo of what i see on my phone when i do the live mode.. as you can see the camera is not moving while taking the picture, which is very pixilated .. FYI i was picturing myself on this photo and i'm at the left lower corner in this picture.
customer_reviews.author: Abdullah AlQuadan

customer_reviews.title: Should have purchased a GoPro : (
customer_reviews.text: This 360FLY HD cam was a fun gadget for about a year. I went to use it this past 4th of July and it wouldn't pair. I tried to reset but it just kept vibrating until it died. Unresponsive in the last week of sitting on the charger. I have reached out to 360fly support who is also unresponsive. Looks like they sold to Voxx international? I have NO faith or confidence in the company, and thought I'd spare future customers the headache.
customer_reviews.author: Ketopunk13

customer_reviews.title: The design es very cool and cute
customer_reviews.text: The design es very cool and cute. The image is ok. the functions ok, But If the recording image doesn't let you rec directly down from your eye line because the architecture. The Mobile app is good, but for streaming, it consumes your data. There is (at the moment) no way to connect it directly to the wifi for Live streaming in events for example.
customer_reviews.author: E. Escamilla

customer_reviews.title: One of the worst camera I ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: The most serious problem is that the seller has sent a used product. There are lots of scratches on the camera even lens. Also some components are omitted such as quick start manual. I bought it in Korea, so it is not easy to get full refund cause of the distance. I never recommend this terrible experience.
customer_reviews.author: ziyuzzang

customer_reviews.title: bad video quality. stretcing a small image to give VR effect
customer_reviews.text: bad video quality overall, slow, overheats fast. bad distortion . I winder if 4K is actually better or just has a bigger image
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: if you leave outside US you cannot download the app
customer_reviews.text: seems to be a good gadget but if you leave outside US you cannot download the app for a region restriction. at moment useless. send an email to support. we will see.....
customer_reviews.author: Marco V.

customer_reviews.title: Resistance
customer_reviews.text: I still have this camera! I dropped it many times, and yet, it still works and has not gotten scratched. There are many times I will just put thee camera under-water just to record something. Never got damaged by water since I had it. And a lot of my recordings are in water. I dropped it on the ground often as well. Never got scratched or damaged. Would recommend if you like 360.
customer_reviews.author: Zachariah

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera for the Price
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to have the full 360 view for my son's go kart racing (being able to scan the full 360 during the entire race is awesome). This camera used with the rugged handlebar mount does the trick! Easy to use app, great instructions for how to use the video editing software (comes with the app). Easy to share / upload your files to FB (it does take a bit of time to get it uploaded after you send it, but it does appear in your FB feed). We had an issue with charging, called the help line, they are shipping out a new charging base free of charge. This far we give it 5 stars, we like it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SCAM ALERT NOT IOS COMPATIBLE
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT DOES NOT WORK ON AN IOS DEVICE. App does not exist in App Store. Called customer service and girl says “ya, it doesn’t work on iOS anymore, I’d return the product”. It is still being sold as an iOS device capable camera and it’s not THIS IS A SCAM!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Just not happy with camera
customer_reviews.text: Just not happy with this camera. Not very easy to get up and running and just not what I expected from an Amazon vendor product. Probably wouldn't purchase from this vendor again, if this is an example of their product quality.
customer_reviews.author: S. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: It's just fine.
customer_reviews.text: Takes pictures well, but is not compatible with google. Picture editing and transfer is also a pain.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mcgibbon

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE NO SUPPORT~!!!
customer_reviews.text: Item is garbage. Was functional for about 4 minutes before internal memory shows 0gb out of 0gb. No support from anyone as the company is out of business. No posts from any social media for over a year now. Phones just say you are first in line for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Scarpone

customer_reviews.title: Video quality sucks
customer_reviews.text: The outside design was awesome, it looked super expensive, super cool and high quality. However when we turned it on and paired it to our phone the quality sucked so bad. It was worse than a flip phone camera. The idea of the 360 camera is awesome but thats something that should come with good quality.
customer_reviews.author: selenab1234

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing, poor mounting ability, novelty wears off quickly.
customer_reviews.text: The novelty wore off after 2 uses and for this price, the product should have a MUCH better means to be secured. The design and weight of this camera caused it to unwind and unscrew on a very simple bike ride and the lens is now ruined. Apart from this, the battery is poor, the on/off switch is not reliable and there's no way to change the memory card. No bueno.
customer_reviews.author: Laurent

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera, picture quality is great, expect a little learning curve!
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera, compact, seems well made. Our first one died in the first day, but we received a replacement quickly. Documentation could be a lot better with regard to getting the videos off the unit. Loses points for not automatically adding the 360 meta data needed to make the 360 functional on YT and FB. A bit of a learning curve with the 360fly Director app, but not bad for free. Wish it would include an export with 360 data to a file only for inclusion on non-YT & FB.
customer_reviews.author: Wellness Marketing dba Endless Pools

customer_reviews.title: Image you may want to check web samples
customer_reviews.text: Decent device, but I really found the image nowhere as good as I'd like.

customer_reviews.title: IT STOPPED WORKING

I called support and yesterday, I was told that I would receive a phone call, but nothing. Please give me a solution to this problem as soon as possible.

After connecting to wifi & bluetooth takes awhile to load device then it disconnects. And if it does happen to stay connected long enough you can't connect to Facebook cause FB no longer support the app.

customer_reviews.title: Do not have to give access to your accounts to post
customer_reviews.text: I used the camera's software to post a 360 video to you YouTube. To do this, I had to grant account access to the app "360YoutubeDemo". I don't trust this software. Instead, I recommend saving as equirectangular and posting yourself. Heavy, takes long to boot, clunky attachment system. Calculated viewing angle less than advertised. Form factor awkward for holding without touching the lens.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera but bad design
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera but bad design. The actual bracket on the bottom that the mount screws into broke off and my camer sank to the bottom of a river. The camera needs a place to mount a floatie or some type of floatation accessory. The bracket shouldn't be so easy to snap off either, maybe I just got a bad one but I'm not sure I would buy it again.

So many features, we'll be playing with this and constantly utilizing new and interesting material in our advertising efforts. Great product, great price, great buy.

customer_reviews.title: Send the safety requirements for the regulated product by the Radio Law.
customer_reviews.text: Certificate of conformity to technical standards (issued by a registration authority) , Photograph of the nameplate (miracle mark reads)

customer_reviews.title: Great technology, but wait for future versions.
customer_reviews.text: Super cool technology and I can't wait to see what comes out next... Maybe wait for the next one where the footage will be clearer. It's given me some great memories and some super cool footage, but it still needs some work. Can't wait for future versions. Some of the areas during playback can be grainy and light sensitivity is a bit wonky depending on the setting. I was really impressed with the FOV, however. Just a few feet away from the camera and it was able to pick up my fee from above waist height.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey White

customer_reviews.title: A great 360 camera for this new niche of the camera ...
customer_reviews.text: A great 360 camera for this new niche of the camera market. Not truly 360° due to the deadspot underneath but works very well and easy to use

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera. In my opinion, I think it's better than GoPro.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great camera especially for what I will use it for!
customer_reviews.text: Even though I purchased the HD vs. the 4K, the camera suits what I will use it for perfectly. I am an educator and consultant in the field of rescue training and with just a little tinkering so far has given me a new way to create video for students. Plus I will be using it for autocross and rallycross so I can't wait to share clips of my runs! Very simple and straightforward to use and record I will highly recommend this action camera to my friends and family!

customer_reviews.text: after some technical hiccups were sorted out (downloading of the updated software did not work out through OS, only worked out through a Samsung tablet) truly amazing tool!

customer_reviews.title: customer service excellent and replace it no questions asked
customer_reviews.text: Internal lens already broke, customer service excellent and replace it no questions asked, but the new one already has a scratch so I think this product is marketed incorrectly. This is a very fragile product and in no means for adventure. Get a tripod and don't touch it much. So if you are looking to place this on a helmet or bike, good luck! Product 1 star Customer service 5 stars

customer_reviews.title: nice camera

customer_reviews.text: I'm really enjoying this 360 camera, but still trying to figure some things out. WiFi and Bluetooth seem to turn themselves off from time to time.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is amazing how great it is to be able to do 360 hemispherical VR videos and pics with just an iPhone and very affordable camera. I would pay double and still feel I got a great deal. Easy to setup and use. My first day I took it out and got awesome video on my motorcycle. Uploaded it to FB and awed everyone. If uncertain, feel confident this is an excellent choice!!!

customer_reviews.text: What this camera after years of seeing it at Best Buy. With everything that’s out there today this thing mounted on my bicycle handlebars still feels some incredible video. It’s not a true 360° of viewable video given the fact that the lens has a 204° field of vision, but for the price I paid, which was like $110 from Amazon warehouse deals, I can’t complain!

customer_reviews.title: Pictures are not good. Because it has only one lense and if ...
customer_reviews.text: Pictures are not good. Because it has only one lense and if you hold it "lens-up" then your image quality accross horizon will be pretty much terrible. So hard to share. I wanted to share my videos on youtube and after one week of trying different ways, and computers, i still can't upload the videos 360. I recommend buying Ricoh Theta S

customer_reviews.title: App is not good with editing and picture taking
customer_reviews.text: I will give 4 stars only because i recieved it on time and packaged perfectly. Other than that the camera is aweful....loses connection with wifi etc. App is not good with editing and picture taking. And of course i didnt think it would bother me but since its one big fish eye everything is distorted. Recently bought gear 360 and 360 2017....great cameras even with a little stiching. I do not recomend

customer_reviews.text: The camera performs amazing. Full 360 view. I scratched my lens and contacted their support and they told me to send it in, they paid for shipping and in just a couple days I got it back better than New with a new charger!!!! Amazing Camera Amazing Contact Support

customer_reviews.title: I was able to capture some great views for the people that were unable to attend

customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a 360 camera - it's a SUPER Fisheye that records images all distorted because of it. Returned.

customer_reviews.text: I don't often write reviews for products, but when I do it's because they're completely dope. We're using 360fly for a world champion super boat racing team, and it's changing the way we think about content creation as a whole. Want 360 degree video? Look no further, this is the new standard to beat.

customer_reviews.author: Anthony Abraham

customer_reviews.title: this product is pretty cool! I don't think there is anything like ...
customer_reviews.text: Now, this product is pretty cool! I don't think there is anything like that out there. I mounted it on my kite board - unbelievable footage. The software is not great but it does it job. You can follow your favorite views and create a regular 2D film out of the recording. 5 stars for sure. BTW, customer service is excellent. I had a 360fly HD before which died. 360fly simply sent me a new one and also extracted all of my footage, Very cool!
customer_reviews.author: Tech User

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera!! Like any brand new technology, there are a few little things to work out but Glenn at 360fly has been so helpful!! He actually called me back on a Sat. night on his way home from a football game to help me out personally. What company does that!!? Super guy, super product all the way around. Cheers 360fly!!!

product_meta.title: 360Fly 4K VR Capable Action Video Camera Professional Camcorder, Black (360Fly 4K)
product_meta.description: Style:4k CameraThe innovative 360fly mobile app turns your smartphone into your camera's viewfinder, controller, editing suite and lets you share your 360 Degree video, 360 Degree stills and POV video directly from your iPhone and Android smartphone to social media, including Facebook and YouTube. Compatible with most iPhones, iPads, and Android devices. Operating Temperature : 20 Degrees to 40 Degrees Celsius / -4 Degrees to 104 Degrees Fahrenheit, Storage Temperature : 20 Degrees to 60 Degrees Celsius / -4 Degrees to 140 Degrees Fahrenheit.
feature_bullets: The 360fly 4K video camera delivers everything you need to capture your entire surroundings in immersive, interactive 360 Degree 4K video from a single digital unit.
Powerful 16-megapixel image sensor. Provides 4K video resolution 2880 x 2880 pixels up to 30fps.
Provides professional video features. Includes time-lapse and front-facing modes as well as motion and audio activation.
Eight glass element ultra-fisheye lens. Allows to capture your life in immersive, interactive 360 Degree video.
Gyroscope, non-assisted GPS and Live Stream via mobile app
